oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Petrography and geochemistry of the miocene limestone of saurashtra, gujarat, west india
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KUMAR, A
SARASWATI, PK
NAVADA, SV
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Petrographically, the carbonate rocks of Saurashtra are of four major types, viz. foraminiferal wackestone, molluscan wackestone, foraminiferal packstone and algal foraminiferal packstone. Geochemical and stable-isotope analysis of these rocks indicates low strontium, high manganese and depletion in delta-O-18. We suggest that these are the effect of diagenetic alteration.
